verses.roman:
svarūpādi-gaṇa tāhāṅ āsiyā mililā
prabhura avasthā dekhi' kāndite lāgilā

synonyms: svarūpa-ādi-gaṇa—the devotees, headed by Svarūpa Dāmodara Gosvāmī; tāhāṅ—there; āsiyā—coming; mililā—met; prabhura—of Lord Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; avasthā—condition; dekhi'-seeing; kāndite lāgilā—began to cry.
translation: When Svarūpa Dāmodara and the other devotees reached the spot and saw the condition of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu, they began to cry.
